titles.title: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail Act
A bill to amend the National Trails System by designating the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 9/22/1988--Introduced. Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail Act - Amends the National Trails System Act of 1968 to include the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail, extending from Nogales, Arizona, to San Francisco, California, as a part of the System. Authorizes appropriations.
